snippet: The judge said the proposed probation sentence did not match the severity of charges against the sheriff, James Metts of Lexington County, who is accused of accepting cash bribes.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Terry L Wooten rejects plea agreement in bribery case against Sheriff James Metts of Lexington County, SC; rules that proposed probation sentence does not match severity of charges against Metts.
lead_paragraph: The judge said the proposed probation sentence did not match the severity of charges against the sheriff, James Metts of Lexington County, who is accused of accepting cash bribes.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Plea Deal for South Carolina Sheriff
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Plea Deal for South Carolina Sheriff
